DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis : Cissus quadrangularis well Irvingia gabonensis use weight management related condition . This study set investigate combination two could additional benefit overweight obese people .
DOC.brief_title: The Use Irvingia Gabonensis ( Bush Mango ) Cissus Quadrangularis Reduce Weight Blood Lipids
DOC.detailed_description: To assess compare effect administration Cissus quadrangularis ( Linn ) Cissus quadrangularis /Irvingia gabonensis combination body weight blood pressure , fast blood glucose , plasma total LDL cholesterol 72 overweight obese subject . The study 10 week randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled design , involve 72 obese overweight participant . Participants randomly divide three group ( 24 participants/ group ) : Group 1 - Placebo ; Group 2 - Cissus quadrangularis ( CQ ) ; Group 3 - Cissus quadrangularis Irvingia gabonensis ( CQ-IG ) . The placebo ( 250mg ) active formulation ( ( 150 mg CQ 250 mg CQ-IG ) administer twice daily meal . Weight well fast blood take baseline , 4 , 8 10 week . No major dietary change exercise suggest study .
DOC.criteria: BMI > 26kg/m2 Diabetics Pregnant lactating Subjects weight loss program Following specific low calorie diet
